metadata.description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2022-2964. Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2022-2964. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2022-2964 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.
